page.title: 02Landscape Shilbottle Village
page.content: {Scott} Shilbottle is a small village with 2741 people,(Shilbottle Ward).It is close to the sea and the A1.Shilbottle is in Northumberland.Northumberland is mostly country side and farms.Most people in Shilbottle work down the pit.Whittle Pit has just got a new boss.There are 3 shops,1 church,1 school and one factory.Sometimes when I come home I have a game of football or cricket,then my dad goes to the club.The club is up Grange Road.In Shilbottle the houses are mostly council houses.
